text: it takes courage for men to stand up for what it is right and to defy toxic masculinity.Our Modern society allows BOYS to grow older without growing up may be many of them are raised without any role model!there is a version of men that is toxic not all men.Society is in desperate need of boundary re-set. a small book The Basics of Masculinity and Feminity is written to provoke thoughts and teach the value of polarity of sexes and at the same time being incredibly educational! #pusillanimous #polarityexpert #masculinityfeminity
